title: Apple Announces macOS Monterey: First Look at New Features
content:
Apple today announced macOS 12, which it's calling macOS Monterey. The new version of macOS is gaining features like Universal Control, AirPlay to Mac, and Shortcuts for Mac.



Universal Control connects your iPad to your Mac, similar to Continuity. You can move your cursor from the Mac seamlessly over to an ‌iPad‌, and control the tablet via your Mac's keyboard and touchpad.
